title: [ 命令方快]关于1.10.2版本中更改弓箭以及剑的攻击速度
author: 哦呕吐
txt_content: 如题所述用nbt标签更改剑的攻击速度和弓的拉弓速度

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,Amount:6.66,Slot:mainhand,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Name:attack,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed},{Operation:0,Amount:7,Slot:mainhand,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Name:attack,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage}]}
拉弓速度原版做不到。。。

replies.author: 风扇滑翔翼
replies.txt_content: 拉弓速度为游戏内的变量 除非自己写json 不然无法做到
